column2: "Oh my! Why, hello there! Been killing lots of Darkers, right? And infected native creatures?"
"Lately, something's been on Lisa's mind. You will listen to Lisa's idle musings, yes?"
"Why do you think it is that Darkers attack ARKS?"
"When one becomes infected, they go berserk, and are especially hostile towards ARKS in particular... But why?"
"Darkers' infection causes insanity, right? So how can they still tell who's ARKS and who's not?"
"How curious! How mysterious! Maybe they do have some reasoning, but that sort of information hasn't been made public."
"Maybe the only way to truly understand their reasoning is to try becoming a Darker yourself?"
"Hehe... just kidding. Lisa loves killing enemies too much to care about that sort of stuff!"
